trans-unit.source: Specifies the feature requirements that bindings must provide to the service or client implementation.
trans-unit.target: Especifica os requisitos de funcionalidade enlaces tem de fornecer para a implementação de serviço ou cliente.

trans-unit.source: Use the DeliveryRequirementsAttribute to instruct [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to confirm that the binding provides the features required by the service or client implementation.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o DeliveryRequirementsAttribute para instruir [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] para confirmar que o enlace fornece as funcionalidades de que a implementação de serviço ou cliente.

trans-unit.source: If a DeliveryRequirementsAttribute attribute is detected when a service description is loaded from an application configuration file or built programmatically in code, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] validates the configured binding and supports all the features that the attribute specifies.
trans-unit.target: Se um atributo DeliveryRequirementsAttribute for detetado quando uma descrição de serviço é carregada a partir de um ficheiro de configuração de aplicação ou através de programação incorporada no código, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] valida o enlace configurado e suporta todas as funcionalidades que especifica o atributo.

trans-unit.source: For example, your service may require the bindings to support queuing.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o serviço poderá requerer os enlaces suportar a colocação em fila.

trans-unit.source: Using DeliveryRequirementsAttribute allows [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to confirm that the following requirements are met: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.QueuedDeliveryRequirements%2A> property specifies the queuing requirements that a binding must meet.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar o DeliveryRequirementsAttribute permite [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] para confirmar que são cumpridos os seguintes requisitos: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.QueuedDeliveryRequirements%2A>propriedade especifica os requisitos de colocação em fila que um enlace tem de cumprir.</xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.QueuedDeliveryRequirements%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.RequireOrderedDelivery%2A> property indicates whether the binding must support ordered messaging.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.RequireOrderedDelivery%2A>propriedade indica se o enlace tem de suportar mensagens ordenadas.</xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.RequireOrderedDelivery%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.TargetContract%2A> property indicates to which type the requirements apply.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.TargetContract%2A>propriedade indica que tipo de aplicam os requisitos.</xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.TargetContract%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DeliveryRequirementsAttribute attribute is applied to a class, which can implement any number of service contract interfaces.
trans-unit.target: O atributo de DeliveryRequirementsAttribute é aplicado a uma classe, que pode implementar qualquer número de interfaces de contrato de serviço.

trans-unit.source: DeliveryRequirementsAttribute can be applied to all the contracts the class implements or to only one of them.
trans-unit.target: DeliveryRequirementsAttribute pode ser aplicada a todos os contratos a classe implementa ou para apenas um deles.

trans-unit.source: The attribute can be applied to a class more than once.
trans-unit.target: O atributo pode ser aplicado a uma classe mais do que uma vez.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The defaults are: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.QueuedDeliveryRequirements%2A> property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode>.
trans-unit.target: As predefinições são:-a <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.QueuedDeliveryRequirements%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.QueuedDeliveryRequirements%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.RequireOrderedDelivery%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.RequireOrderedDelivery%2A>propriedade está definida como `false`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.DeliveryRequirementsAttribute.RequireOrderedDelivery%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the binding for a service must support queued contracts.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se o enlace para um serviço tem de suportar contratos em fila.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode> instructs [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to confirm that the binding supports queued delivery.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode>dá instruções ao [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] para confirmar que o enlace suporta entrega em fila.</xref:System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode> value instructs [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to confirm that the binding does not support queued delivery.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode>valor dá instruções ao [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] para confirmar que o enlace não suporta a entrega em fila.</xref:System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode"></xref> values; the default is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode"> </xref> valores; a predefinição é <xref href="System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor não é um do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.QueuedDeliveryRequirementsMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the binding must support ordered messages.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se o enlace tem de suportar mensagens ordenadas.

trans-unit.source: Setting the RequireOrderedDelivery property to `false` instructs [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to perform no validation.
trans-unit.target: Definir a propriedade RequireOrderedDelivery como `false` dá instruções ao [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] efetuar nenhuma validação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> instructs [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to confirm that the binding must support the ordering of messages; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>dá instruções ao [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] para confirmar que o enlace tem de suportar a ordenação de mensagens em fila; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Implements the IContractBehavior.AddBindingParameters method to attach binding parameters correctly.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o método IContractBehavior.AddBindingParameters para anexar os parâmetros de enlace corretamente.

trans-unit.source: The contract description.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do contrato.

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint for the contract.
trans-unit.target: O ponto final de serviço para o contrato.

trans-unit.source: The binding parameters.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros de enlace.

trans-unit.source: Implementation of the IContractBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior method for client support.
trans-unit.target: Implementação do método IContractBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior para suporte de cliente.

trans-unit.source: The contract description to which the behavior is attached.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do contrato ao qual está ligado o comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint for the contract.
trans-unit.target: O ponto final para o contrato.

trans-unit.source: The client runtime on which the behavior operates.
trans-unit.target: O tempo de execução de cliente, no qual o comportamento funciona.

trans-unit.source: Implementation of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method that enables service support.
trans-unit.target: Implementação do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName> método que permite o suporte de serviço.

trans-unit.source: The contract description to which the behavior is attached.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do contrato ao qual está ligado o comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint for the contract.
trans-unit.target: O ponto final para o contrato.

trans-unit.source: The dispatch runtime that supports the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: O runtime de distribuição que suporta o ponto final.

trans-unit.source: Implements the IContractBehavior.Validate method to enable validation support.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o método IContractBehavior.Validate para ativar o suporte de validação.

trans-unit.source: The contract description.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do contrato.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to be validated.
trans-unit.target: O ponto final para ser validado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type to which it applies.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de aos quais se aplica.

trans-unit.source: A service class can implement any number of service contract interfaces.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe de serviço, pode implementar qualquer número de interfaces de contrato de serviço.

trans-unit.source: Use the TargetContract property to validate that endpoints with the TargetContract have bindings that support the requirements.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade TargetContract para validar que os pontos finais com o TargetContract têm enlaces que suportem os requisitos.

trans-unit.source: This attribute can be used any number of times on the same class.
trans-unit.target: Este atributo pode ser utilizada qualquer número de vezes na mesma classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to which the attribute applies.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>ao qual se aplica o atributo.</xref:System.Type>
